attributes.action: `NO` DNA SHOULD BE RETAINED BY THE POLICE FOR `ALL` NONE CHARGED ALLEGATIONS.
attributes.additional_details: We want `ALL` DNA removed from police data bases for none charged people, it is against human rights when allegations have `not` been proven, why should someone have this on record until 100yrs, does not make sense, criminals `yes` but not law abiding people, this `MUST` be removed as being a stupid rule from the HOME OFFICE who should be dealing with the ones who are here and should not be and into crime ripping OFF the BRITISH people, WRONG SO PLEASE CORRECT IT, asap.
